ext-numeralpha-list-type-numeral: Word used to indicate that the list type will be numeric
ext-numeralpha-list-type-alpha: Word used to indicate that the list type will be alphabetical
ext-numeralpha-list-type-roman: Word used to indicate that the list type will be Roman numerals
ext-numeralpha-list-type-label:
Parser function parameter name for "type", which indicates the list type (numeric, alpahbetical or Roman numerals)
{{Identical|Type}}
ext-numeralpha-list-set-label:
Parser function parameter name for "set", which indicates what value to start the list at
{{Identical|Set}}
ext-numeralpha-list-pad-length: Parser function parameter name for "pad length"
ext-numeralpha-list-pad-char: Parser function parameter name for "pad character"
